'''Sneaky Wu''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the [[Monoceros Caeli Chapter]], Act I: [[Mighty Cyclops' Adventure!]]

In [[Teucer's Terrific Tour]], he and his two brothers were trying to make a deal with Tartaglia when negotiations broke down as [[Teucer]] and the [[Traveler]] interrupt the meeting.
